Description: Fragment foot and wall of Attic black-glazed pottery plate. Low ring foot; lower wall moulded outside. Wholly glazed, save perhaps for worn stand-ring. Linked palmettes and rouletting on floor. Incised inscription.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 585)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1905)
